targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(spf_aligned_w) AS "True", SUM(spf_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(dkim_aligned_w) AS "True", SUM(dkim_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(dmarc_aligned_w) AS "True", SUM(dmarc_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua LIMIT 50
SELECT time, SUM(spf_pass) AS "Pass", SUM(spf_fail) AS "Fail" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT time, SUM(dkim_pass) AS "Pass", SUM(dkim_fail) AS "Fail" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(spf_aligned) AS "True", time, SUM(spf_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(dkim_aligned) AS "True", time, SUM(dkim_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(dmarc_aligned) AS "True", time, SUM(dkim_unaligned) AS "False" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT time, SUM(dispo_none) AS "None", SUM(dispo_quarantine) AS "Quarantine", SUM(dispo_reject) AS "Reject" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY time LIMIT 50
SELECT SUM(count) FROM dmarc.rua LIMIT 50
SELECT source_base_domain AS "Reverse DNS Base", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_base_domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC LIMIT 2000

panels.title: Top 2000 Message Sources by Reverse DNS

targets.rawSql: SELECT org_name AS "Reporting Organisation", org_extra_contact_info AS "Org Contact Info", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY org_name, org_extra_contact_info ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC
SELECT header_from AS "Header From", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY header_from ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC
SELECT SUM(count), source_country, lat, lon FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_country, lat, lon LIMIT 50
SELECT source_country AS "Country", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_country ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC

SELECT source_base_domain AS "Sending Domain", source_reverse_dns AS "PTR", source_ip_address AS "Source IP", source_country AS "Country", disposition AS "Disposition", spf_aligned AS "SPF", dkim_aligned AS "DKIM", org_name AS "Reporter", spf_result AS "SPF Auth Result", dkim_result AS "DKIM Auth Result", domain AS "Email Domain", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_base_domain, source_reverse_dns, source_ip_address, source_country, disposition, spf_aligned, dkim_aligned, org_name, spf_result, dkim_result, domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC

SELECT domain AS "Domain", adkim AS "DKIM Policy", aspf AS "SPF Policy", sp AS "Forensic Policy", p AS "Policy", pct AS "Percentage", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY domain, adkim, aspf, sp, p, pct ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC

SELECT source_ip_address AS "IP Address", source_reverse_dns AS "Reverse DNS", source_base_domain AS "Base Domain", source_country AS "Country", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY source_ip_address, source_reverse_dns, source_base_domain, source_country ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC LIMIT 1000

SELECT header_from AS "Header From", envelope_from AS "Envelope From", spf_result AS "SPF Result", spf_aligned AS "SPF Aligned", source_base_domain AS "Reverse DNS Base", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY header_from, envelope_from, spf_result, spf_aligned, source_base_domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC

SELECT header_from AS "Header From", dkim_selector AS "DKIM Selector", dkim_domain AS "DKIM Domain", dkim_result AS "DKIM Result", dkim_aligned AS "DKIM Aligned", source_base_domain AS "Reverse DNS Base", SUM(count) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.rua GROUP BY header_from, dkim_selector, dkim_domain, dkim_result, dkim_aligned, source_base_domain ORDER BY SUM(count) DESC

SELECT arrival_date AS "Arrival Date", auth_failure AS "Auth Failure", delivery_result AS "Delivery Result", original_from AS "Original From", original_to AS "Original To", COUNT(feedback_type) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.ruf GROUP BY arrival_date, auth_failure, delivery_result, original_from, original_to ORDER BY COUNT(feedback_type) DESC
SELECT COUNT(feedback_type), source_country, lat, lon FROM dmarc.ruf GROUP BY source_country, lat, lon LIMIT 50
SELECT source_country AS "Country", COUNT(feedback_type) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.ruf GROUP BY source_country ORDER BY COUNT(feedback_type) DESC

SELECT source_ip AS "IP Address", reported_domain AS "Base Domain", source_country AS "Country", COUNT(feedback_type) AS "Messages" FROM dmarc.ruf GROUP BY source_ip, reported_domain, source_country ORDER BY COUNT(feedback_type) DESC

panels.title: Top 1000 Forensic Sample Source IP Addresses
